title: Friendly Vector
description: Une esthétique de design plat minimaliste caractérisée par des formes organiques simplifiées et des remplissages de couleurs unies sans contours externes. Le style utilise des traits épais et monolignes dans une couleur sombre contrastée uniquement pour les détails internes et les traits du visage, s'inspirant fortement de l'iconographie moderne des interfaces utilisateur et des tendances 'Corporate Memphis'.
description_en: A minimalist flat design aesthetic characterized by simplified, organic shapes and solid color fills with no external outlines. The style utilizes thick, monoline strokes in a contrasting dark color strictly for internal details and facial features, drawing heavily from modern UI iconography and 'Corporate Memphis' trends.
description_fr: Une esthétique de design plat minimaliste caractérisée par des formes organiques simplifiées et des remplissages de couleurs unies sans contours externes. Le style utilise des traits épais et monolignes dans une couleur sombre contrastée uniquement pour les détails internes et les traits du visage, s'inspirant fortement de l'iconographie moderne des interfaces utilisateur et des tendances 'Corporate Memphis'.
prompt: Ultra-minimalist 2D flat vector illustration style, strictly two-dimensional rendering with zero depth cues, no shadows, no highlights, and no gradients. The {{subject}} is reduced to its most essential geometric and organic forms, depicted as a cohesive, soft-edged silhouette filled with a solid, matte {{primary_color}}. Crucially, the outer perimeter of the subject has NO outline; it is defined solely by the contrast of the color fill against the surroundings. Internal details, facial expressions, clothing folds, and gestural lines are rendered in a uniform, heavy-weight monoline stroke in deep {{accent_color}}, utilizing rounded line caps and confident, simple curves. The visual language draws heavily from modern tech spot illustrations and sticker art, prioritizing readability and friendliness over anatomical correctness. Proportions are exaggerated, rounded, and rubber-hose flexible, with limbs flowing directly from the main body mass without sharp joint articulation. The composition is stark, graphic, and centered. The lighting model is non-existent, relying entirely on local color to define form. The surface texture is perfectly smooth, resembling a digital SVG or screen-printed solid ink. The atmosphere is helpful, benign, and universally accessible, typical of tech onboarding screens or friendly mascot design. {{mood}} energy is conveyed through posture and simple facial shorthand (dots for eyes, curved lines for mouths).
